original_title: Presidential Secretariat establishes Task Forces to simplify business processes
original_body_lines: On the directives of President Ranil Wickremesinghe, the Presidential Secretariat has organized 54 institutions that provide investor facilitation services under seven Task Forces  The aim is to create a business-friendly environment in the country by simplifying the  process involved and  increase efficiency.
Limit on the issuance of Treasury Bills to be raised to Rs. 6,000 billion
